name: toggl-reporter
description: Allows to generate reports from https://toggl.com

scripts.pretest: npm run-script lint-js && npm run-script build-html
scripts.clean: rm -rf static; rm src/template.js; mkdir static
scripts.build-js: npm run-script build-vendor && npm run-script build-app
scripts.build: npm run-script build-html && npm run-script build-js && npm run-script build-fonts && npm run-script build-css
scripts.watch: concurrently "npm run-script watch-js" "npm run-script watch-css" "npm run-script watch-html"
scripts.dev: npm run-script clean && npm run-script build-fonts && npm run-script build-vendor && concurrently "node index.js" "npm run-script watch"
scripts.dist: npm run-script clean && npm test && npm run-script build
scripts.start: npm run-script clean && npm run-script build && node index.js

author: Pawel Chudzik
